model

Class AndSolutionNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractSolutionNode
      • model.AndSolutionNode

  • public class AndSolutionNode
extends AbstractSolutionNode
    This class represents a and node in the tree of proof. A solution node is a node in a tree of proof.
    Author:
    Alexandre Camus

      • AndSolutionNode

        public AndSolutionNode(And clause,
               RuleSet rules,
               SubstitutionSet parentSolution,
               AbstractSolutionNode parentNode)
        Constructor of the class.
        Parameters:
        clause - the and clause to be proved by this subtree.
        rules - the rules representing context of the proof.
        parentSolution - the solution of the parent node in the tree of proof.
        parentNode - the parent node in the tree of proof.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeadSolutionNode

        protected AbstractSolutionNode getHeadSolutionNode()
        Gets the solution node of the and clause's head.

        This is based on the representation of an and clause. See And class for more details.

        Returns:
        a AbstractSolutionNode representing the solution node of the head.

      • getTailSolutionNode

        protected AbstractSolutionNode getTailSolutionNode()
        Gets the solution node of the and clause's tail.

        This is based on the representation of an and clause. See And class for more details.

        Returns:
        a AbstractSolutionNode representing the solution node of the tail.

      • reset

        protected void reset(SubstitutionSet newParentSolution,
         RuleSet newRuleSet)
        Resets the subtree to the new state of the database and resets all the counters that prevent from infinite evaluation of the node.
        Overrides:
        reset in class AbstractSolutionNode
        Parameters:
        newParentSolution - the new parent solution of the subtree.
        newRuleSet - the new state of the database.
        See Also:
        AbstractSolutionNode.reset(model.SubstitutionSet, model.RuleSet)

      • nextSolution

        public SubstitutionSet nextSolution()
        Creates the next solution for the and clause of the node. If no solution exists, it will create a solution. Otherwise it will get a different solution or return null if there no other different solution.
        Specified by:
        nextSolution in class AbstractSolutionNode
        Returns:
        a SubstitutionSet object representing the bindings of the next solution or null if there is no next solution.
        See Also:
        AbstractSolutionNode.nextSolution()
